name: urbanism
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the type of life that is typical of cities and towns: The exhibition is devoted to the artistic life, architecture and urbanism of Paris from 1830 to 1914. The movie is set in the world of shopping malls and airports, of urbanism Lagos and Shenzhen style.
the process by which more and more people leave the countryside to live in cities and towns: Early sociologists tended to bemoan the loss of community in the face of modern urbanism. Synonym
urbanization
More examplesFewer examplesThe concept of new urbanism focuses on traditional town forms, emphasising the need for a recognisable centre, such as a square or public hall.The old part of town is delightful: Basque urbanism at its most attractive.The rise of urbanism brought with it a rise in crime.
